query:
SELECT 
  id,
  codigo,
  destino,
  usado,
  expiraEm,
  createdAt,
  CASE 
    WHEN usado = 1 THEN 'JÁ USADO'
    WHEN expiraEm < NOW() THEN 'EXPIRADO'
    ELSE 'VÁLIDO'
  END as status,
  TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, NOW(), expiraEm) as minutos_restantes
FROM codigosAcessoGestante 
WHERE codigo = '999999'
ORDER BY createdAt DESC 
LIMIT 1;

  usado,
  expiraEm,
  createdAt,
  CASE 
    WHEN usado = 1 THEN 'JÁ USADO'
    WHEN expiraEm < NOW() THEN 'EXPIRADO'
    ELSE 'VÁLIDO'
  END as status,
  TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, NOW(), expiraEm) as minutos_restantes
FROM codigosAcessoGestante 
WHERE codigo = '999999'
ORDER BY createdAt DESC
